attributes.additional_details: I am a member of staff at acorns nursery and we are being made redundant with 2months to find other jobs. Nobody from the company can tell us why the nursery is closing? There is no reason for the nursery to close! We are a very close team and have a very clues bond with Parents. Acorns is situated on the grounds of the Edinburgh royal infirmary where the new sick kids is being built but not for another two years do please help us stay open.
